course.subject: ISOM
course.name: Operations Management
course.description: Introduction to management of business processes that produce goods or services: topics include operations strategy, process analysis, queuing systems, inventory management, quality management, process improvement and other important issues.
course.exclusions: IEDA 5170, IMBA 5110

reviews.author: Kira0612
reviews.comment_content: Mainly about supply chain, revenue analysis, demand forecast, queue theory, capacity theory, quality control, etc.
reviews.comment_teaching: Suri is good at teaching. This course may involve many spreadsheet analysis, and doesn't have text books. His Powerpoint and spreadsheets are important for you to pass the final exam.
reviews.comment_grading:
Group project on Littlefiled simulation (simulation cash balance ranking and report): 24.7/25
Homework: 15/15
Participation: not sure, but may be 7/10 or 8/10
Final: 45/50
Final grade is A.
reviews.comment_workload: He has spreadsheet or case analysis homework every week, which may cost about 2-3 hours to finish. Also, the course contains a two-week simulation, so the workload is a bit heavy.
